title.headline: eMush - Cooperative multiplayer game: betrayal and survival in space!

alpha.homepage:
eMush is not currently open to the public as the game is not fully finished and is infested with Mushs!!!

If you are interested in the game, feel free to join us on Discord and on the Eternaltwin forums. All information is available on Eternaltwin.

About the eMush alpha, private ships are regularly being launched with the help of volunteers on Discord. To be part of an alpha ship, you will have to register on Eternaltwin and join the list of volunteers on Discord.

If you are not shortlisted for an alpha ship, don't worry! The selection list rotates for each ship to offer everyone a chance.
alpha.description: This is an alpha for testers only.
alpha.inventoryDescription: Click here to open the Room Inventory
alpha.issue: Please report the encountered bugs on

footer.crowdin: You can help us translating the game on
footer.translatorsAndAlphaTesters: to our translators and all alpha testers :)
footer.eternaltwin: eMush is a non-commercial website operated by volunteers. It belongs to the Eternaltwin project, whose purpose is to preserve Motion Twin's games. This means we want to ensure they remain available even if the official website closes. We are not related to Motion Twin.

endCause.eden: The Daedalus has settled on Eden!

neronAnnouncement.destroyAndUpdateContent: **Alert**: Daedalus is doomed to imminent destruction. Indeed, the almighty developers have planned a major **game update**. *Get ready for creative new ways to meet your end!*
neronAnnouncement.maintenanceContent: Dear crew, get ready for **game maintenance** in *1 cycle*. Use this time to contemplate the existential void or reflect on your life choices: *the fun will continue after the technical break... Or not*.
neronAnnouncement.sendNeronAnnouncementToAllDaedaluses: Send a NERON announcement to all Daedalus

charSelection.shipNotFound: No ship was found. One should be created in the incoming hour!

communications.unbookmarkDescription: Remove this thread from your favorites.

homePage.synopsis: You're about to wake up aboard the Daedalus with 15 other rebels. Like you, they are fleeing the Mush, a parasitic fungus which is ravaging Earth and threatens Humanity.

errors.badGateway: The proxy has received an invalid response. This error is most likely due to server synchronization: try again later!
errors.cannotAccessExploration: You're not allowed to see this expedition. It's a private ship, aren't you ashamed?
errors.consultCommunity: If the problem persists, please check with the community on Discord or the forum.
errors.gameInMaintenance: The game is under maintenance, please come back later!
errors.neronMessage: NERON: A thousand apologies. My designer programmed me with love, but nobody's perfect. An error occurred while trying to load the requested page... If the site is unavailable, please try again in a few minutes.
errors.Not Found: The requested resource has not been found.
errors.player cannot reach parameter: You cannot reach the target of the action (is it still in the room?).
errors.problem: There was a problem processing your request.
errors.reportToDevs: Please report this error to the developers, with details of how it occurred.
errors.title: ERROR
errors.You have been banned!: As a result of your actions, you have been banned by a moderator. If you think this is a mistake, please open a ticket on the Eternaltwin Discord.

metaSeo.description: eMush is a remake of Mush, the award-winning survival and investigation game from Motion Twin (Twinoid). Dive into a thrilling space opera that blends survival, social deduction and role-playing in a unique multiplayer experience!
metaSeo.og:title: eMush - Cooperative multiplayer game: betrayal and survival in space!
metaSeo.og:description: eMush is a remake of Mush, the award-winning survival and investigation game from Motion Twin (Twinoid). Dive into a thrilling space opera that blends survival, social deduction and role-playing in a unique multiplayer experience!

reportPopup.message: You can report inappropriate behavior on the Eternaltwin Discord server.//// When you arrive at the server, ask to open a ticket to report inappropriate behavior on eMush.// You will then be put in contact with our moderators. Don't forget to provide them with the following information:////- Your eMush username (you are **{username}**)// - Your ship ID (you are in the ship **number {daedalusId}**)// - The character to report// - The reason for your report
reportPopup.title: Reporting inappropriate behavior

filters.logContentDescription: Name of the log to search for. For the moment, you need to enter the log code (given in brackets). In the future, pre-selected filters (aggressive actions, mush actions...) will be available.
filters.roomDescription: Room for which you want to see the logs. For now, you need to enter the room code (shown in brackets).

theEndPage.editMessageDescription: Replace this message with a warning from NERON.
theEndPage.hideMessageDescription: Hide this message: it will only be visible to the author and moderators.
theEndPage.messageIsHiddenDescription: This message is hidden. It is only visible to its author and moderators.

sanction.banDescription: Ban this user from joining ships (you can unban him at any time).
sanction.quarantineAndBanDescription: Quarantine and ban this player. He'll leave the game and won't be able to join others.
sanction.quarantineDescription: Quarantine this player, who will leave the game.
sanction.deleteDescription: This action deletes the message and replaces it with a message from NERON.

moderation.unbanDescription: Unban this user so that they can rejoin a ship again.
moderation.reloadDataDescription: Reload page data. Note: there is no need to use this button in most cases. Data is automatically reloaded each time a filter is changed.
moderation.searchByDaedalusId: Search for a Daedalus by ID :
moderation.suspendSanctionDescription: Suspend sanction. The end date is set to the current date. The sanction remains in the user's history.
moderation.removeSanctionDescription: Delete sanction. The sanction is completely removed from the user's history.

rules.title: Rules of eMush

introduction.textIntro: eMush is a community game offering numerous ways of communication and means of acting. The aim of these rules is to allow games to run smoothly and to ensure a pleasant game experience to all the players. The rules stated here are not meant to be exhaustive and are likely to evolve along with the development of the game. Players will be informed of each update via a notification on the Eternaltwin Discord server.
introduction.alphaLeeway: The rules marked by this icon signal that a certain leeway is applied during the period of open alpha tests (see last paragraph).

communication.title: Communication
communication.introText: The rules concerning communication apply to all places allowing the player to communicate by sending messages: main channel, private channels, Mush channel, missions, general announcements, messages at the end of ships. These messages can all be subjected to moderation after the facts, at the discretion of the game’s admins and moderators according to the following guidelines:
communication.courtesy: Courtesy: Communication being an essential part of the game, players are allowed a lot of leeway as to the words used, and the aim here is not to list the forbidden words exhaustively. However, in order to guarantee a sound and inclusive game atmosphere to all players, any form of explicit language, intolerance, hatred, discrimination, harassment, violence is strictly prohibited.
communication.spokenLanguage: Spoken language: The player must be able to communicate easily in the language of the server.

behaviour.title: Behaviour
behaviour.introText: This section is not meant to constitute an exhaustive list of tolerated or forbidden behaviours, but to give an idea of behaviours that go against the spirit of the game.
behaviour.multiAccounts: Multi-accounts: It is forbidden to have more than one account per person on the eMush game. Lending, giving or sharing accounts is also forbidden.
behaviour.spoilingHuman: Human griefing: As a human, it is forbidden to seriously ruin the other players’ playing experience by committing deliberate and conscious actions threatening to impede the objective of the human side.
behaviour.spoilingMush: Mush griefing: As a Mush, it is forbidden to deliberately harm your own side, including but not limited to revealing the identity of the Mush, either yourself or the other Mush. This can only be tolerated for ex-Mush on whom the serum has been used, but it is advised to use common sense.
behaviour.suicide: Suicide : It is forbidden to voluntarily leave a game, either actively or passively, by exploiting the game's mechanisms.

sanctionsAppeal.title: Sanctions and appeal
sanctionsAppeal.sanctionText: Any failure to follow these rules regarding communication or behaviour can be subjected to a sanction, ranging from a warning to banning from the game with immediate effect, temporarily or not.
sanctionsAppeal.appealText: Players are notified of their sanction via a message on the main page of the game. From then on, they have the possibility to appeal the sanction by opening a ticket on the EternalTwin Discord server and explaining their case. Moderators have special tools at their disposal as well as access to all messages and details of a game.
sanctionsAppeal.allPlatformText: In case of repeat offences or of behaviour that is considered serious enough, the sanctions can be applied to all the games and functionalities of the Eternaltwin platform.

alphaRules.title: Rules specific to the open alpha
alphaRules.introText: In the aim of contributing actively to the development and testing of the game, allowances are made to the rules marked by this icon in the preceding rules. These allowances are applicable until the opening of the game in a new phase, and players will be notified of any modification.
alphaRules.tests: Testing facilitation : The aim of the alpha phase is to involve the community in the development of the game, to obtain feedback and bug reports. To this end, any bug must be reported immediately to the development team without being exploited, and it remains forbidden to behave in a way that seriously harms the game experience of other players. To find out what features are available, please consult the roadmap.
alphaRules.spokenLanguage: Allowances on the spoken language: During the development phases, the frequentation of the various servers can be unequal. In that context, players not having knowledge of the French language are allowed to join games on the French server. It is then recommended to notify the crew and to make particular efforts to communicate with them.
alphaRules.cooperation: Allowances on the cooperation between humans and Mush: In order to test the game’s functionalities, the “investigation” part of the Mush game is not expected to be respected. In particular, cooperation between humans and Mush is tolerated in order to test game mechanisms.
alphaRules.endText: Note that all rules not marked by the icon remain fully applicable during the alpha period.

newRulesPopUp.title: Information
newRulesPopUp.message: The game rules have been updated: please accept them to continue playing.

rules.iHaveReadRules: I confirm that I have read the rules
rules.thanks: Thank you for accepting the eMush rules!
